item.text: Therefore, be imitators of God as dearly loved children

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, <st data-num="2531" class="">just as</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, a <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrificial</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3744 2175">fragrant</st> <st data-num="4376" class="">offering</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> there must <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> be either <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>, <st data-num="167" class="">impurity</st> of <st data-num="3956">any kind</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4124" class="">greed</st>, <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> these are <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4241" class="">fitting</st> for the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>.<n id="3" />

Neither should there be <st data-num="151" class="">vulgar speech</st>, <st data-num="3473" class="">foolish talk</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2160" class="">coarse jesting</st>—all of <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> are <st data-num="3756 433">out of character</st>—<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st>.
For you can be confident of this one thing: that no person who is immoral, impure, or greedy (such a person is an idolater) has any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and God.
Let nobody deceive you with empty words, for because of these things God’s wrath comes on the sons of disobedience.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4830">sharers with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> of the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st><n id="1" /> consists <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="19" class="">goodness</st>, <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>—

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4790" class="">participate</st> in the <st data-num="175" class="">unfruitful</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> of <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1651" class="">expose</st> them.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> being <st data-num="1651" class="">exposed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> are <st data-num="5319">made visible</st>.

For everything made visible is light, and for this reason it says:

“Awake, O sleeper!

Rise from the dead,

and Christ will shine on you!”
Therefore consider carefully how you live—not as unwise but as wise,

<st data-num="1805" class="">taking advantage</st> of <st data-num="2540" class="">every opportunity</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> get <st data-num="3182" class="">drunk</st> with <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="810" class="">debauchery</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> be <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="3" />

and submitting to one another out of reverence for Christ.
Wives, submit to your husbands as to the Lord,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of the <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> (he <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> being the <st data-num="4990" class="">savior</st> of the <st data-num="4983">body</st>).

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="5293" class="">submits</st> to <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st> should submit to their <st data-num="435" class="">husbands</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>.

<st data-num="435" class="">Husbands</st>, <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>

<st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="37" class="">sanctify</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> by <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st><n id="1" /> with the <st data-num="3067" class="">washing</st> of the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4487" class="">word</st>,

<st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> may <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> as <st data-num="1741" class="">glorious</st>—<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">having</st> a <st data-num="4696" class="">stain</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4512" class="">wrinkle</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st> <st data-num="5108">such blemish</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="299" class="">blameless</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3779">In the same way</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="435" class="">husbands</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">ought</st> to <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their own</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st>. He who <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> has <st data-num="4218" class="">ever</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hated</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">body</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> he <st data-num="1625" class="">feeds</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2282">takes care</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> also does the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>,

<st data-num="3754">because</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>.<n id="1" />
For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and will be joined to his wife, and the two will become one flesh.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st>—<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am actually<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="1519">with reference to</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>.
Nevertheless, each one of you must also love his own wife as he loves himself, and the wife must respect her husband.
